references.paper_title: Exploration and apprenticeship learning in reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is foundational to safe reinforcement learning by introducing exploration strategies crucial for safe and efficient learning in unknown environments.
This work provides a fundamental algorithm for constrained Markov decision processes (CMDPs), a core framework for safe reinforcement learning.
This paper introduces the concept of shielding, a crucial technique for ensuring safety guarantees in reinforcement learning agents by preventing unsafe actions.

references.paper_title: Constrained Markov decision processes: stochastic modeling
references.reason: This book provides a comprehensive overview of constrained Markov decision processes (CMDPs), a fundamental mathematical framework for addressing safety and constraint satisfaction in reinforcement learning.

references.paper_title: Control barrier functions: Theory and applications
references.reason: This paper introduces Control Barrier Functions (CBFs), a powerful tool for enforcing safety constraints in control systems, offering theoretical insights applicable to safe reinforcement learning.
